FIT Classification: a Python library¶

Welcome to our project. FIT Classification: a Python library is a Pyhton library that enables you to use API of the Classification project from within your Python scripts and programs. It also takes care of storing and updating an access token for you and simplifies some other things. For more information please refer to the sections below.

Contents:

  • About this project
  • Key features
    • Access token management
    • Memorizing some ubiquitous parameters
    • Python objects to simplify request body generation
    • Simplified operations
  • Getting started

    • Logging in

    • Classification Proxy
    • Helper classes (request body generation)
    • Exceptions
